sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The J2SDK package contains appletviewer, extcheck, idlj, jar, jarsigner, java, javac, javadoc, javah, javap, jdb, keytool, native2ascii, orbd, policytool, rmic, rmid, rmiregistry, rmiregistry, serialver, servertool and tnameserv.

sect3.title: appletviewer
sect3.para: appletviewer runs Java applets outside of the context of a browser.

sect3.title: extcheck
sect3.para: extcheck checks a specified JAR file for title and version conflicts with any extensions installed in the JDK software.

sect3.title: idlj
sect3.para: idlj generates Java bindings from a given IDL file.

sect3.title: jar
sect3.para: jar combines multiple files into a single JAR archive file.

sect3.title: jarsigner
sect3.para: jarsigner signs JAR (Java ARchive) files and verifies the signatures and integrity of a signed JAR.

sect3.title: java
sect3.para: java launches a Java application by starting a Java runtime environment, loading a specified class and invoking its main method.

sect3.title: javac
sect3.para: javac reads class and interface definitions, written in the Java programming language, and compiles them into bytecode class files.

sect3.title: javadoc
sect3.para: javadoc parses the declarations and documentation comments in a set of Java source files and produces a corresponding set of HTML pages describing the classes, interfaces, constructors, methods, and fields.

sect3.title: javah
sect3.para: javah generates C header and source files that are needed to implement native methods.

sect3.title: javap
sect3.para: javap disassembles a Java class file.

sect3.title: jdb
sect3.para: jdb is a simple command-line debugger for Java classes.

sect3.title: keytool
sect3.para: keytool is a key and certificate management utility.

sect3.title: native2ascii
sect3.para: native2ascii converts files that contain non-supported character encoding into files containing Latin-1 or Unicode-encoded characters.

sect3.title: orbd
sect3.para: orbd is used to enable clients to transparently locate and invoke persistent objects on servers in the CORBA environment.

sect3.title: policytool
sect3.para: policytool creates and manages a policy file graphically.

sect3.title: rmic
sect3.para: rmic generates stub and skeleton class files for remote objects from the names of compiled Java classes that contain remote object implementations.

sect3.title: rmid
sect3.para: rmid starts the activation system daemon.

sect3.title: rmiregistry
sect3.para: rmiregistry creates and starts a remote object registry on the specified port on the current host.

sect3.title: serialver
sect3.para: serialver returns the serialVersionUID for one or more classes in a form suitable for copying into an evolving class.

sect3.title: servertool
sect3.para: servertool provides an ease-of-use interface for application programmers to register, unregister, startup and shutdown a server.

sect3.title: tnameserv
sect3.para: tnameserv starts the Java IDL name server.
